# Colors _(System.Colors)_
![Banner](Banner.svg "Colors (System.Colors)")
[![Project status: Active – The project has reached a stable, usable state and is being actively developed.](https://img.shields.io/badge/Status-Active-859900.svg?logo=git&logoColor=fff "Project status: Active – The project has reached a stable, usable state and is being actively developed.")](https://www.repostatus.org/#active) [![Latest version](https://img.shields.io/github/v/tag/lperezperez/System.Colors?color=2aa198&label=Version&logo=V&logoColor=fff "Latest version")](https://github.com/lperezperez/System.Colors/releases/) [![standard-readme compliant](https://img.shields.io/badge/Readme-Standard-6c71c4.svg?logo=MarkDown "README standard style")](https://github.com/RichardLitt/standard-readme) [![Keep a Changelog 1.0.0](https://img.shields.io/badge/Changelog-1.0.0-d33682.svg?logo=MarkDown "Keep a Changelog 1.0.0")](http://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/) [![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-dc322f.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64, "License: MIT")](LICENSE.md) [![Latest build status](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/lperezperez/System.Colors/Build?label=Build&logo=GitHub "Latest build status")](https://github.com/lperezperez/System.Colors/actions?query=workflow%3ABuild) [![NuGet version](https://img.shields.io/nuget/vpre/System.Colors?color=268bd2&label=NuGet&logo=NuGet "NuGet version")](https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Colors)
> A [.NET Standard](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/standard/net-standard) library designed to make working with colors easy.

This library provides a set of classes and methods which helps to work with multiple [color spaces](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_space) through [.NET Standard](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/standard/net-standard).

Hugely based on the [ColorMine](http://www.colormine.org) [source code](https://github.com/hvalidi/ColorMine).

## Table of Contents
* [Background](#background)
* [Install](#install)
* [Usage](#usage)
* [ChangeLog](#ChangeLog)
* [Maintainer](#Maintainer)
* [Contributing](#contributing)
* [License](#license)

## Background
The main purpose of this project is to provide conversions between [```System.Drawing.Color```](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/system.drawing.color) and other [color spaces](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_space), which allows to make use of functionalities that cannot be applied directly in the RGB color space.

For example, the [distance](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_difference) between two [```System.Drawing.Color```](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/system.drawing.color) instances can be calculated using diferent [perceptual formulas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_difference#CIELAB_%CE%94E*).

## Install
### Through NuGet
* Add the NuGet package to your project.
  * From the command line:
    ```bash
    dotnet add package System.Colors
    ```
  * From the NuGet Package Manager Console (on [Visual Studio](https://visualstudio.microsoft.com)):
    ```bash
    Install-Package System.Colors
    ```
> For more information on install NuGet packages in Visual Studio see the following [documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/nuget/quickstart/install-and-use-a-package-in-visual-studio).

### Manual installation
1. Download the [latest release version](https://github.com/lperezperez/System.Colors/archive/master.zip "latest stable version").

_Or_
1. Clone the repository.
    ```bash
    git clone https://github.com/lperezperez/System.Colors.git
    ```
2. Install .NET Core 3.1 or later version
  * [For Linux](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/install/linux)
  * [For macOS](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/install/macOS)
  * [For Windows](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/install/windows)
3. Build the project
    ```bash
    dotnet build -c Release
    ```
4. Copy the ```bin/Release/netstandard2.0/System.Colors.dll``` file generated during the build process.
## Usage
The library allows to:
* Convert a [```System.Drawing.Color```](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/system.drawing.color) to any ```System.Colors.IColorSpace``` explicit or implicitly.

  Examples:
  ```cs
  var color = new Color();
  var cieLab = color.To<CieLab>();
  var cieLch = color.To<CieLch>();
  var cieLuv = color.To<CieLuv>();
  var cieXyy = color.To<CieXyy>();
  var cieXyz = color.To<CieXyz>();
  var cmy = color.To<Cmy>();
  var cmyk = color.To<Cmyk>();
  var hexTriplet = color.To<HexTriplet>();
  var hsl = color.To<Hsl>();
  var hsv = color.To<Hsv>();
  var hunterLab = color.To<HunterLab>();
  var rgb = color.To<Rgb>();
  ```
* Convert a ```System.Colors.IColorSpace``` to any other ```System.Colors.IColorSpace```.

  Examples:
  ```cs
  var cieLab = new CieLab();
  var cieLch = cieLab.To<CieLch>();
  var cieLuv = cieLch.To<CieLuv>();
  var cieXyy = cieLch.To<CieXyy>();
  var cieXyz = cieXyy.To<CieXyz>();
  var cmy = cieXyz.To<Cmy>();
  var cmyk = cmy.To<Cmyk>();
  var hexTriplet = cmyk.To<HexTriplet>();
  var hsl = hexTriplet.To<Hsl>();
  var hsv = hsl.To<Hsv>();
  var hunterLab = hsv.To<HunterLab>();
  var rgb = hunterLab.To<Rgb>();
  cieLab = rgb.To<CieLab>();
  ```
* Calculate the distance between two ```System.Colors.IColorSpace``` or [```System.Drawing.Color```](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/system.drawing.color) instances based on different metrics:
  * [CIE76](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_difference#CIE76)
  * [CIE94](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_difference#CIE94)
  * [CIEDE2000](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_difference#CIEDE2000)
  * [CMC l:c](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_difference#CMC_l:c_(1984))

  Examples:

  ```System.Colors.IColorSpace```
  ```cs
  var cieLab = new Color().To<CieLab>();
  var color = new Color();
  double distance;
  distance = cieLab.Distance<Cie76Comparison>(color.To<CieLch>());
  distance = cieLab.Distance<Cie94Comparison>(color.To<CieLuv>());
  distance = cieLab.Distance<Ciede2000Comparison>(color.To<CieXyy>());
  distance = cieLab.Distance<CmcComparison>(color.To<CieXyz>());
  
  ...
  
  var rgb = new Color().To<Rgb>();
  distance = rgb.Distance<Cie76Comparison>(color.To<CieLab>());
  distance = rgb.Distance<Cie94Comparison>(color.To<CieLch>());
  distance = rgb.Distance<Ciede2000Comparison>(color.To<CieLuv>());
  distance = rgb.Distance<CmcComparison>(color.To<CieXyy>());
  ```
  [```System.Drawing.Color```](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/system.drawing.color)
  ```cs
  var color1 = new Color();
  var color2 = new Color();
  double distance;
  distance = color1.Distance<Cie76Comparison>(color2.To<CieLab>());
  distance = color1.Distance<Cie94Comparison>(color2.To<CieLch>());
  distance = color1.Distance<Ciede2000Comparison>(color2.To<CieLuv>());
  distance = color1.Distance<CmcComparison>(color2.To<CieXyy>());
  ```
For more information, see the [documentation pages](https://github.com/lperezperez/System.Colors/wiki).
